trans-unit.source: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece painéis de cada lado do formulário e um painel central que pode conter um ou mais controles.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> é semelhante a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: It uses four docked side panels (instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) and one central panel (an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) to create a typical arrangement.
trans-unit.target: Ele usa quatro painéis encaixados lado (instâncias de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) e um painel central (uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) para criar uma organização típica.

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível remover os painéis de lado, mas você pode ocultá-las, definindo suas respectivas <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> propriedades `false`.

trans-unit.source: By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, cada uma dessas propriedades é `true` em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Also at design time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> appears with its top panel already expanded.
trans-unit.target: Também em tempo de design, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> é exibida com o painel superior estiver expandido.

trans-unit.source: You can neither remove nor hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível remover nem ocultar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

trans-unit.source: You can arrange one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode organizar uma ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controles em painéis de lado e você podem usar o painel central para outros controles.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> também fornece uma maneira de obter o suporte do processador para o corpo do formulário para uma aparência consistente.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> não dá suporte a aplicativos de Interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> for MDI applications.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> para aplicativos MDI.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a Windows Forms, adding items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, and adding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> e um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> para formulários do Windows, adicionando itens ao <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e adicionar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o painel inferior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que representa o painel inferior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanel%2A> propriedade a adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controla ou movê-los de outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o painel inferior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> está visível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o painel inferior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> estiver visível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a bottom panel.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> propriedade `false` para usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> sem um painel inferior.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control causes validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o controle aciona a validação; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.CausesValidation" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.CausesValidation" /> muda.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the center panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o painel central do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> representing the center panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> que representa o painel central do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar a parte superior, inferior, esquerda e direita painéis do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> para manter <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controles.

trans-unit.source: Controls other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> are automatically added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Controles que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> são adicionados automaticamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o painel esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> que representa o painel esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanel%2A> propriedade a adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controla ou movê-los de outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o painel esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> está visível.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o painel esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> estiver visível; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a left panel.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> propriedade `false` para usar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> sem um painel esquerdo.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o painel direito do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o painel direito do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> está visível.

trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o painel superior do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> está visível.
